# Interactive scatter plot

Here is a visual illustration of star wars characters on an interactive scatter plot. The code can be replicated. Enjoy.

```{r}
#|message: FALSE
#|warning: FALSE
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
data(starwars)
data<- starwars %>% filter(!is.na(height), !is.na(mass))
p <- ggplot(data, aes(height, mass)) +
  geom_point(
    aes(
      text = paste0(
        "<b>", name, "</b>",
        "<br>Species: ", coalesce(species, "Unknown"),
        "<br>Homeworld: ", coalesce(homeworld, "Unknown"),
        "<br>Height: ", height, " cm",
        "<br>Mass: ", mass, " kg"
      ),
      colour = species
    ),
    size = 2.5, alpha = 0.9
  ) +
  coord_cartesian(ylim = c(0, 200)) +
  labs(x = "Height (cm)", y = "Mass (kg)", color = "Species") +
  theme_minimal()
ggplotly(p, tooltip = "text")
```
